parameters.functionScript:
if (!Boolean(Noodl.Variables.supabase)){
    console.error("Supabase client not initialized")
    return
}
const id = Inputs.Id
try {
    const { data, error } = await Noodl.Variables.supabase
        .from("inspection_request")
        .select()
        .eq("id",id)
    
    console.log("[fetch inspection_request] data : ",data)

    if (data.length>0) {
        Outputs.assigned_to_inspector = data[0].all_inspectors
        Outputs.client_address_1 = data[0].client_address_1
        Outputs.client_address_2 = data[0].client_address_2
        Outputs.client_city = data[0].client_city
        Outputs.client_contact = data[0].client_contact
        Outputs.client_email = data[0].client_email
        Outputs.client_name = data[0].client_name
        Outputs.client_phone = data[0].client_phone
        Outputs.client_state = data[0].client_state
        Outputs.client_zip_code = data[0].client_zip_code
        Outputs.inspection_date = data[0].inspection_date
        Outputs.inspection_property_type = data[0].inspection_property_type
        Outputs.inspection_site_address_1 = data[0].inspection_site_address_1
        Outputs.inspection_site_address_2 = data[0].inspection_site_address_2
        Outputs.inspection_site_city = data[0].inspection_site_city
        Outputs.inspection_site_floor = data[0].inspection_site_floor
        Outputs.inspection_site_state = data[0].inspection_site_state
        Outputs.inspection_site_zip_code = data[0].inspection_site_zip_code
        Outputs.inspection_time = data[0].inspection_time
        Outputs.inspection_type = data[0].inspection_type
        Outputs.project_number = data[0].project_number
        Outputs.status = data[0].status

        Outputs.Success()

    } else {
        Outputs.error = error
        Outputs.NoUserData()
    }

} catch (error) {
    console.error(error)
    Outputs.Failure()
}

if (!Boolean(Noodl.Variables.supabase)){
    console.error("Supabase client not initialized")
    return
}
const id = Inputs.Id
try {
    const { data, error } = await Noodl.Variables.supabase
        .from("chain_of_custody")
        .select()
        .eq("inspection_id",id)
    
    console.log("[fetch inspection_request] data : ",data)

    if (data.length>0) {
        Outputs.tat = data[0].tat
        Outputs.email_result_to = data[0].email_result_to
        Outputs.relinquished_by = data[0].relinquished_by
        Outputs.relinquished_on_date = data[0].relinquished_on_date
        Outputs.relinquished_on_time = data[0].relinquished_on_time
        Outputs.received_by_lab = data[0].received_by_lab
        Outputs.received_by_date = data[0].received_by_date
        Outputs.received_by_time = data[0].received_by_time
        Outputs.analyze_by = data[0].analyze_by
        Outputs.analyze_by_date = data[0].analyze_by_date
        Outputs.analyze_by_time = data[0].analyze_by_time
        Outputs.suite = data[0].suite
        Outputs.instruction = data[0].instruction

        Outputs.Success()

    } else {
        Outputs.error = error
        Outputs.NoUserData()
    }

} catch (error) {
    console.error(error)
    Outputs.Failure()
}

parameters.Schema:
schema({
Suite:string().required('Must provide Apartment/Suite.'),
TAT:string().required('Must provide TAT.'),
Relinquished:string().required('Must provide Relinquished by.'),
Received:string().required('Must provide Received by.'),
RelinquishedTime:string().required('Must provide Relinquished by date.'),
ReceivedTime:string().required('Must provide Received by date.'),
Manager:string().required('Must provide Manager.'),

})

After generating report this Inspection request will be closed.
